content.raw: Paco and I have some Python 3 compat changes for the image ouput widget in labscript_utils coming, then I still need to check in with the RbK lab to see if they have made changes, possibly in relation to Ian's comments above. But at some point we can merge this and then consider further changes to be bugfixes on top, so we won't leave this unmerged for much longer.
